application.name: SOM (Self Organizing Maps) Surface Reconstruction
application.summary: [p]The SOM Surface reconstruction application aims at creating 3D surface object by using Self Organizing Map networks.[/p][p]This work is Jointly-developed by Prof. Dr. Siti Mariyam Shamsuddin and Dr. Shafaatunnur Hasan from UTM Big Data Centre, Skudai, Johor, Malaysia and Prof Dr. Noel Lopes from Polytechnic of Guarda, Portugal

parameter.name: Device
parameter.summary: Device (CPU or GPU) to be used to train the SOM network.

parameter.name: Header line
parameter.summary: If true the first line of the datasets (containing the caption) will be ignored

parameter.name: Samples
parameter.summary: Number of training samples to be processed. A value of 0 (zero) means all.

option.name: Dual Layer Map (For Surface Reconstruction Only!)

parameter.name: Number of Layer
parameter.summary: Number of Layer (1 for single layer)

parameter.name: Initial random seed
parameter.summary: The initial random seed. If 0 (zero) a new random seed will be obtained.
